sense.def: Alternative Names tong jiang 痛強 , pain with stiffness.

Illness Sign of pain accompanied by a hardening of muscle tissue. Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 4: 小腹拘急，腰 背強痛，心中虛悸，咽乾唇燥，面體少色 , “Cramps and tension in the lower abdomen. Stiffness with pain affecting the lumbar region and the back. Depletion and palpitation in the heart. Dry throat and parched lips. Face and body have a pale complexion”. Jiang ying 強硬 , stiffness [4]

Illness Sign of a specific part of the body turning stiff making any movement rather uncomfortable. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 6: 治肺臟中風，心胸氣促，項背強硬，皮膚不仁，麻 黃散方 , “To cure a lung depot struck by wind with agitated qi in the heart and chest, stiffness of the nape and back, and numbness of the skin, the recipe [to ingest] the powder with ma huang [is advisable]”.
